member_organisations: UBP is member of different trade associations and organisations related to the financial services sector in Switzerland and EU, such as the SFAMA, ASB,ALFI, and others (non-exhaustive list).
fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Principally EU action plan on sustainable Finance. Also other broader initiatives relevant to the financial services industry.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: UBP Asset Management Benelux 273 Avenue de Tervueren
goals__remit: Union Bancaire Privée (UBP) is a long-standing Swiss private bank, with a Tier 1 ratio of 27.4% as at 31 December 2017. The Bank is specialised in Asset management for both private and institutional clients. It is based in Geneva and employs 1700 people in over twenty locations worldwide; it held some CHF 125.3 billion in assets under management as at 31 December 2017.
relevant_communication: Communication via UBP's membership of the Investment Leaders Group and relationship with Cambridge Institute of Sustainability Leadership.
